RIGHT OF ENTRY
In cases where the death of a person with a right of inheritance precedes that of the decedent, that person's portion of the estate shall pass to his or her children, the decedent's grandchildren, in equal shares; if one of the grandchildren dies prior to the decedent, the portion the grandchild would be entitled to if he or she had survived the death of the decedent shall pass to his or her children, the decedent's great-grandchildren, in equal shares, and so on as long as there are any decedent's descendants.
